EmailTemplate.name: PS GSL1 PRM-Request Update for Partner User Relationship Type - No Longer Employ
EmailTemplate.subject: PRM-Request Update for Partner User Relationship Type - No Longer Employed : {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.PS_Stakeholder__c},
Please process the following Partner-related request based on the details below:
PRM-Request Update for Partner User Relationship Type - No Longer Employed
Partner Account Name
{!Case.Account}
ALCR ID / 1*
SAP ID / 2*
Account ID / 3*
Partner User Name
Partner User Email
Partner User Status
Additional Notes
Once completed, please revert with the confirmation.
If additional information is needed, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at partner.support@nokia.com.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} Partner Support Desk Email: partner.support@nokia.com
Partner Portal
Copyright 2020 Nokia
Thread Id: {{!Case.Thread_Id}}
